linear.regression

Class MultipleLinearRegression

  • java.lang.Object
    • linear.regression.MultipleLinearRegression
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinearRegression

    public final class MultipleLinearRegression
extends Object
implements LinearRegression
    A linear regression model with support for both single and multiple prediction variables. This implementation is immutable and thread-safe.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MultipleLinearRegression.Builder
      A builder for a multiple linear regression model.
